original_text: But David said to Saul, “Your servant used to keep sheep for his father. And when there came a lion, or a bear, and took a lamb from the flock,
korean_text: 다윗이 사울에게 말하되 주의 종이 아버지의 양을 지킬 때에 사자나 곰이 와서 양 떼에서 새끼를 물어가면

sentences.original_text: Your servant used to keep sheep for his father.
And when there came a lion, or a bear,
and took a lamb from the flock,
sentences.korean_translation: 양 떼에서 어린 양을 물어갔을 때에,
